cast.name: 布鲁斯·布劳尔 Bruce Blauer
Toni Ann Rossi Toni Ann Rossi

introduction: Janis witnessed her twin brother kill their parents. Twenty years later, she waits for him to come to kill her for her testimony that put him away. Trained in martial arts, she's ready. All Janis wants is closure.Janis Mckenzie (Lisa Varga), is a blond, beautiful and intelligent. She should have no trouble making friends. But she does, A series of traumatic events in her life have made her reluctant to let people get close. A near death experience, while in the Army during the Gulf War, and losing the love of her life, have left invisible scars. But the deepest scar came from her twin brother Jamey (Kenneth Stellingwerf). At age 16, she saw him butcher knife their parents to death. He blames Janis for his going to prison and promises to kill her when he gets out. Now, 20 years later, Jamey is coming, and all Janis wants is closure.
